query: Given these retrieval results, compute Recall@5 and MRR. Queries: 3. Relevant doc IDs: Q1=[D2], Q2=[D7,D9], Q3=[D1]. Retrieved@5: Q1=[D2,D3,D4,D5,D6], Q2=[D8,D7,D10,D11,D12], Q3=[D3,D4,D5,D6,D7].

query: Create an evaluation set of 30 questions to test an AI agent that answers AI questions. Include 10 beginner, 10 intermediate, 10 advanced. Also propose a scoring rubric and compute an overall score given these model results: beginner=0.86, intermediate=0.74, advanced=0.61 with weights 0.2/0.3/0.5.
available_tools: [{"type": "function", "function": {"name": "eval_set_generator", "description": "Generates an evaluation question set for an AI QA agent with difficulty distribution and topics.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"n_total": {"type": "number", "description": "Total number of questions."}, "difficulty_split": {"type": "object", "description": "Mapping of difficulty to count."}, "topics": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}, "description": "Topics to cover (e.g., transformers, RAG, eval, safety)."}, "include_answer_key": {"type": "boolean", "description": "Whether to include reference answers."}}, "required": ["n_total", "difficulty_split", "topics", "include_answer_key"]}}}, {"type": "function", "function": {"name": "rubric_builder", "description": "Builds a scoring rubric for AI QA responses (accuracy, completeness, citations, safety).", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"criteria": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}, "description": "List of rubric criteria."}, "scale_max": {"type": "number", "description": "Maximum score per criterion."}, "require_citations": {"type": "boolean", "description": "Whether citations are required for full credit."}}, "required": ["criteria", "scale_max", "require_citations"]}}}, {"type": "function", "function": {"name": "weighted_score_calculator", "description": "Computes a weighted overall score from category scores and weights.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"scores": {"type": "object", "description": "Mapping from category to score (0-1)."}, "weights": {"type": "object", "description": "Mapping from category to weight (sums to 1)."}, "round_to": {"type": "number", "description": "Decimal places to round to."}}, "required": ["scores", "weights", "round_to"]}}}]
